text: Othaikku Othai () is an upcoming Indian Tamil-language action drama film written and directed by Barnesh, starring Atharvaa and Sri Divya in the lead roles, while Narain, Chandhana and Vidya Pradeep play pivotal roles.http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movies-cinema-news-17/vidya-pradeep- talks-about-her-role-in-atharvaas-othaikku- otha.htmlhttp://www.indiaglitz.com/vidya-pradeep-to-play-the-heroine-of- atharvaa-in-othaikku-oththa-barnesh-thiagarajan-narain-tamil- news-176417.htmlhttp://www.ayngaran.com/frame.php?iframepath=newsdetails.php?newsid=14462 The film began production during January 2017,http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/atharvaa- and-narain-come-together-for-othaikku-oththa/articleshow/56046252.cms and was in post-production in June 2020.https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/vidya- pradeeps-shocking-experience-in-kollywood/articleshow/76505962.cms ==Production== In October 2016, newcomer director Barnesh, a former assistant to Pa. Ranjith, announced that he would make his directorial debut through a film featuring Atharvaa in the lead role which would be produced by Vision I Medias and feature editing and cinematography by Selva and Ramalingam respectively.http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movies-cinema-news-16/atharvaa- said-to-team-with-newbie-baranesh.html In a press release in December 2016, Barnesh revealed that the film was titled Othaikku Othai and would "be about friendships, romance, fight and anger", set in the backdrop of Salem-based students in their three years of college life between 2003 and 2005.http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movies-cinema-news-16/debutant-director- barnesh-on-othaikku-othai-with-atharvaa-as-hero.html The film was launched in December 2016, with actors Narain and Ashish Vidyarthi added to the cast, while Justin Prabhakaran was signed to work as the music composer.http://www.sify.com/movies/atharvaa-and-narain-join-hands-for- othaikku-oththa-news-tamil- qmsjKyhggbeai.htmlhttp://www.desimartini.com/news/tamil/atharvaa-to-portray-a- student-in-otthaiku/article40872.htm Actresses Sri Divya, Vidya Pradeep and Chandhana also joined the cast of the film.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/Atharvaa- loses-weight-to-play-a-college-student/articleshow/55955614.cms ==References== Category:Upcoming films Category:Upcoming Tamil-language films Category:Indian films Category:Unreleased Tamil-language films Category:Films scored by Justin Prabhakaran Category:Upcoming directorial debut films Category:Films set in universities and colleges
